com.viaoa.hub
Class HubFilter

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.hub.HubListenerAdapter
      com.viaoa.hub.HubFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
HubFilterInterface, HubListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener
public abstract class HubFilter
extends HubListenerAdapter
implements java.io.Serializable, HubFilterInterface

HubFilter is used to create a Hub that has objects that are filtered from another Hub.

All that is needed is to subclass the HubFilter and implement the "isUsed()" method to know if an object is to be included in the filtered Hub.

Example

    Hub hubFilter = new Hub(Employee.class)
    new HubFilter(hubAllEmployees, hubFilter) {
        public boolean isUsed(Object obj) {
            // .... code to check if object should be added to hubFilter
        }
    };

For more information about this package, see documentation.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

setServerSideOnly

public void setServerSideOnly(boolean b)
This needs to be set to true if it is only create on the server, but client applications will be using the same Hub that is filtered. This is so that changes on the hub will be published to the clients, even if initiated on OAClientTread.

Parameters:
b -

isUsed

public abstract boolean isUsed(java.lang.Object object)
Method used to know if object should be in filtered hub. HubFilter will automatically listen to Master hub and call this method when needed.

Specified by:
isUsed in interface HubFilterInterface
Returns:
true to include object

getObject

public java.lang.Object getObject(java.lang.Object object)
This is called when isUsed() is true, to get the object to use.
This can be overwritten to replace the object with another object.

setRefreshOnLinkChange

public void setRefreshOnLinkChange(boolean b)
Flag to know if refresh needs to be called when/if the linkTo hub AO is changed. This is false by default.
